reviewText: not that exciting after all, good at a party maybe...

I use (sometimes) Shadow Dancers at my DJ gigs when I DJ the proper place not going to use these at a graduation party I have a projection unit and put this on a rear projection screen (like a bed sheet) and looks nice.

Definitely the naughtiest of the bunch, and one I couldn't be without. This special edition of the Shadow Dancers is beyond what you'd expect a dvd to be. It's full of spectacular imagery that will stimulate every part of your body!
I'll keep it short and sweet, you get what you pay for, this is far from expensive and can also be used as a Shadow Dancers only version, so you get a pretty darn good deal if you ask me!

As sexy as the other shadow dancing DVDs may be, this one is the opposite.  Most of it has to do with the way it was filmed: it is as though when shooting from the "nude" side of the screen, the camera crew was instructed to film in a completely different - and unsexy - way compared to the way they film the "shadow" screen.  There are 3 models.  The first one, when filmed from the "other side," is filmed from the chest up 90 percent of the time.  The second one spends most of the time on the floor, stripper-style, rather than actually dancing.  She also has lots of flab on her belly and a terrible boob job.  The third model never actually gets nude - she keeps her thong on.  Bottom line is - NOT sexy at all.  Spend your money elsewhere.

First let me say I love the Shadow Dancers DVDs at our parties, then I saw this and oh yeah! At last a peek behind the screens. Shelly Martinez (TNA Wrestler and Video Queen) has an amazing body, she is smoking hot and so sexy, Ella Rose is smoldering and when she looks into the camera like she does... Get me a drink! Anna Belle is dirty hot.. OK enough said!
